thread.title: Ground News - Dry January Could Lower Your Cancer Risk
thread.title_full: Ground News - Dry January Could Lower Your Cancer Risk

author: Gizmodo
title: Ground News - Dry January Could Lower Your Cancer Risk
text:
Summary by Gizmodo In case you need it, here’s another reason to go all-in on Dry January: Scientists with the World Health Organization found that reducing or eliminating alcohol consumption can lower your risk of oral and related cancers. The findings are the latest to indicate that even modest drinking isn’t harmless.Read more... Share menu More
